```python
def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or not word:
        return False
    word = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z]', '', word).lower()
    letter_count = Counter(word)
    return len(set(letter_count.values())) == 1
```

    word = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z]', '', word).lower()
    count = Counter(word)
    return len(set(count.values())) == 1
```

```python
def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or not word:
        return False
    filtered_word = ''.join(c.lower() for c in word if c.isalpha())
    letter_counts = Counter(filtered_word)
    return len(set(letter_counts.values())) == 1
```

```python
def is_isogram(word):

        return False
    cleaned_word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word.lower()))
    letter_count = Counter(cleaned_word)
    return len(set(letter_count.values())) == 1

    word = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z]', '', word).lower()
    counter = Counter(word)
    return len(set(counter.values())) == 1
```

    return len(set(letter_counts.values())) == 1

    letter_count = Counter(word)
    return len(set(letter_count.values())) == 1

```python
def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or len(word) == 0:
        return False
    
    # Normalize the string: remove non-letter characters and convert to lowercase
    normalized_word = ''.join(c.lower() for c in word if c.isalpha())
    
    if len(normalized_word) == 0:
        return False
    
    # Count occurrences of each character
    char_count = Counter(normalized_word)
    
    # Check if all characters have the same count
    counts = list(char_count.values())
    return all(count == counts[0] for count in counts)
```

    return len(set(letter_count.values())) == 1

def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or not word:
        return False
    word = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z]', '', word).lower()
    counts = Counter(word)
    return len(set(counts.values())) == 1

def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or len(word) == 0:
        return False
    
    # Normalize the string: remove non-letter characters and convert to lowercase
    normalized_word = ''.join(c.lower() for c in word if c.isalpha())
    
    if len(normalized_word) == 0:
        return False
    
    # Count occurrences of each character
    char_count = Counter(normalized_word)
    
    # Check if all characters have the same count
    counts = list(char_count.values())
    return all(count == counts[0] for count in counts)
```
